kchandra423.movableKImages

Class MovableKImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • kchandra423.movableKImages.MovableKImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scalable, Movable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    KCollider

    public class MovableKImage
extends java.lang.Object
implements Scalable
    Adds basic physics and transformation to KImages.
    See Also:
    Movable

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MovableKImage.ImageMode
      Determines how Images are drawn and rotated.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MovableKImage(KImage kImage)
      Creates a new Movable KImage at 0,0 with angle 0, not reflected, and an ImageMode of corner
      MovableKImage(KImage kImage, float x, float y, float angle, boolean reflected, MovableKImage.ImageMode mode)
      Creates a new Movable Kimage at x,y, with angle angle, the given reflection and Image mode.

                     float x,
                     float y,
                     float angle,
                     boolean reflected,
                     MovableKImage.ImageMode mode)
        Creates a new Movable Kimage at x,y, with angle angle, the given reflection and Image mode.
        Parameters:
        kImage - The base KImage
        x - The initial x location
        y - The initial y location
        angle - The initial angle in radians
        reflected - Whether this image is reflected
        mode - The image mode of this object
